001package ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.util;
002
003/**
004 * Utility methods for reading unsigned integers from byte arrays.
005 *
006 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
007 */
008public final class Bytes {
009  private Bytes() {}
010
011  /**
012   * Reads an unsigned 8-bit value.
013   *
014   * @param a byte array source; may be {@code null}
015   * @param off offset in the array
016   * @return unsigned value in the range {@code [0,255]} or {@code 0} if out of bounds
017   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
018   */
019  public static int u8(byte[] a, int off) {
020    if (a == null || off < 0 || off >= a.length) {
021      return 0;
022    }
023    return a[off] & 0xFF;
024  }
025
026  /**
027   * Reads an unsigned 16-bit big-endian value.
028   *
029   * @param a byte array source; may be {@code null}
030   * @param off offset of the first byte
031   * @return unsigned value or {@code 0} when insufficient bytes remain
032   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
033   */
034  public static int u16be(byte[] a, int off) {
035    if (a == null || off < 0 || off + 1 >= a.length) {
036      return 0;
037    }
038    return ((a[off] & 0xFF) << 8) | (a[off + 1] & 0xFF);
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Reads an unsigned 32-bit big-endian value.
043   *
044   * @param a byte array source; may be {@code null}
045   * @param off offset of the most significant byte
046   * @return unsigned value as an {@code int} (higher bits truncated) or {@code 0} if out of bounds
047   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
048   */
049  public static int u32be(byte[] a, int off) {
050    if (a == null || off < 0 || off + 3 >= a.length) {
051      return 0;
052    }
053    return ((a[off] & 0xFF) << 24)
054        | ((a[off + 1] & 0xFF) << 16)
055        | ((a[off + 2] & 0xFF) << 8)
056        | (a[off + 3] & 0xFF);
057  }
058}
